overview.summary: MatlabNrrdsReader allows the user to load a matrix from a MATLAB .mat file

description.p: This module imports N-dimensional matrices from MATLAB .mat files. Currently only files from matlab version 5 and higher are supported by this module. The module reads dense matrices of any of the supported data classes in matlab (short, int, double, etc.).
In order to facilitate the selection process the module will list all matrices in the file that are compatible with the SCIRun NRRD class and will select the most obvious one as a default.

The module has six output ports that can be assigned different matrices. As the matlab file format supports more than one matrix per file, mutliple matrices can be read at once by this module. Use the "Port 1" to "Port 6" buttons to select the port and set the matrix that should be loaded at this output port.
